sentence.Network_en: Cause ( sth ) to re - echo; disturb with noise.
sentence.Network_cn: 使 ( 某物 ) 反覆回响; 以噪声搅扰.

sentence.Network_en: White cloth of the law, as above, the actual situation should re - echo the change in density.
sentence.Network_cn: 布白之法, 如同上述, 宜重虚实呼应、疏密变化.

sentence.Network_en: If you're not satisfied with the life you're living, don't just complain. Do something about it.
sentence.Network_cn: 对于现况的不满，不能只是抱怨，要有勇气作出改变。
